content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.37 - Corrosive liquids referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) Corrosive liquids listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 2500 pounds gross
weight, regardless of size of container, or 2500 pounds net weight in a tank
vehicle. (b) When it is known that
said article contains less than 10 percent free mineral acid, or free caustic, or other liquids having similar effect and the shipping paper is noted
accordingly, it is allowed passage without quantity restriction when the
container size is 16 ounces or less, otherwise, the quantity is not to exceed
5000 pounds gross weight per vehicle, regardless of the size of container, or
not to exceed 2500 pounds net weight in a tank vehicle. (c) There are no restrictions on the passage
of empty tank vehicles * or the transport of empty containers which last
contained such corrosive liquid provided the accompanying shipping papers show
them to be empty. Notes
